question: Who is the India's Sherpa at the 14th G20 Summit in Osaka?
explanation: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will attend the 14th G20 Summit in Osaka, Japan on 28th and 29th of June 2019. Former Union Minister Suresh Prabhu will be India\'s sherpa at the summit. More than 20 countries will be participating in the G20 Summit. Informal meeting of the BRICS leaders and bilateral meetings with other leaders would also take place on the sidelines of the summit. The theme of the summit is \"Human-centred future society\". India has participated in all the G20 Summits held so far. It will host the G20 summit in 2022 for the first time.
